title: Shocker Internet Drive In - Week 38: "Sexy Summer Sin" Double Feature

sources.title: Shocker Internet Drive In - Week 38: "Sexy Summer Sin" Double Feature
sources.description: Well, after a bit of renovations (as well as a much deserved summer break), your favorite Shocker Internet Drive In is back open for business with a double feature of "Sexy Summer Sin". Our first feature is Dario Argento's "Deep Red" (aka "Profondo Rosso" and "The Hatchet Murders"), a wonderful creepy tale about a reporter basically be chased around by a murderer while investigating the death of a musician. Then, after a brief intermission, we proudly present 1976's "Sisters of Death", featuring a group of lovely sorority sisters reuniting years after the death of a member â needless to say someone is mighty upset. As always, we have include a set of nifty coming attractions, a cartoon and plenty of ads for our wonderful snack bar. So, grab your partner and come down to our big screen for some hot summer fun. NEW Facebook Address:  https://www.facebook.com/shockerdrivein.dx.am website: http://shockerdrivein.dx.am or http://shockerdrivein.freeoda.com
